mapper.select: select id,yh_mch yhMch,yh_mm yhMm from t_mall_user_account where yh_mch = #{yhMch} and yh_mm = #{yhMm}

SELECT yc.*, ycr.replyContent replyContent, yh.titles titles, tmua.yh_tx yhTx, tmua.yh_mch yhMch, yc.replyState replyState FROM y_comment yc, t_mall_user_account tmua, y_commentreply ycr, y_hotspot yh WHERE tmua.Id = yc.userId AND yh.id = yc.hotPointId and tmua.id=ycr.forReplyId and ycr.toReplyId=yc.userId ORDER BY yc.createTime desc
mapper.update: update y_comment yc set yc.state=#{param1} where yc.id=#{param2}
